meanings: (돈·물건 등을) borrow, (은행 등에서) take out a loan (=꾸다)
전화 기본 표현 Can I use your phone?
실용회화-돈을 빌릴 때 Could you lend me some money?

vlive.korean: 형 기타 잠깐 빌릴 수 있어요? 이따가... Hey, can I borrow your guitar a little bit? Later... 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP15 #첸의유일한단점 #뭐가더문제일까? #멘트폭주
vlive.english: Hey, can I borrow your guitar a little bit? Later...

vlive.korean: 어디 빌릴 데는 없어? You don't have anyone who can lend you some money? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : [연애포차 시즌1] - EP.03 인생은 꼬여도 썸은 계속된다
vlive.english: You don't have anyone who can lend you some money?

vlive.korean: 이걸로 하면 안 돼? 나 그거 빌릴 수 있어? - 내가 새로운 요리를... Can I use this? Can I borrow that? - I made a new dish... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]TWICE X Calling Recipe (트와이스 X 부재중레시피)
vlive.english: Can I use this? Can I borrow that? - I made a new dish...

vlive.korean: 빌릴 거래요. She says she will borrow it. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [UZZU TAPE (우쭈테잎)] EP. 16 경복궁 야간기행, 시간의 다리를 건너다!
vlive.english: She says she will borrow it.

vlive.korean: 자전거 빌릴 수 있나? Can I borrow a bicycle? 듣기 View video IMFACT : [LEESANG] 특지도전

examples.korean: Can I borrow your umbrella? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우산 좀 빌릴 수 있을까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can I borrow your umbrella? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ve arranged that we can borrow their car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 그들의 차를 빌릴 수 있도록 내가 주선해 두었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve arranged that we can borrow their car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They may need to borrow money in pursuance of their legal action. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 소송을 하려면 돈을 빌릴 필요가 있을지 모른다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They may need to borrow money in pursuance of their legal action. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Members can borrow up to ten books from the library at any one time. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 회원들은 도서관에서 어느 때든 한 번에 10권까지 책을 빌릴 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Members can borrow up to ten books from the library at any one time. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: An angel in borrowing, a devil in repaying. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 빌릴 때는 천사요, 갚을 때는 악마다. (서양속담, 돈속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: An angel in borrowing, a devil in repaying. Add to Wordbook
